sorular.soru: How fast is this road user allowed to drive here?

feedback.metin: Drivers of disabled vehicles using a footpath or pavement fall under the category of pedestrians. In this case, they may only drive at a speed of up to 6 km/h.

sorular.soru: At what maximum speed are you allowed to overtake this lorry?

feedback.metin: The speed limit for a passenger car with a trailer on the autoweg or motorway is 90 km/h. In this case you are driving on a motorway. Even when overtaking, you are not allowed to exceed this speed limit.
